about_the_game:
Distant Isles
Distant Isles is a party-based RPG with roguelike features. Stranded on a procedurally-generated island you will gather party members, explore and fight creatures in search of hidden treasures. The game is inspired by CRPGs, Roguelikes and Table-Top Roleplaying Games.

Key Features
Key features include:
  • Real-time with Pause gameplay;
  • Permanent death of the Player Character and party members (after an injury is sustained);
  • Character customisation, levelling and skill trees;
  • Resource management, including party resilience and inventory;
  • A large number of items, traits, enemies and injuries; and
  • Procedurally-generated islands and maps to explore.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes pixel art combat between characters fighting with weapons, sustaining injuries and death.
